programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: New series. Documentary examining the history of famous buildings, beginning by going behind the scenes of the royal residence, which is presently the official London residence of, among others, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, and Prince Harry. The palace is also where Queen Victoria was born and raised, and was converted into a heavy artillery base during the Second World War, when it also saw a German POW camp established in the grounds.(n)

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire: A Year in the Wild: Summer.
programme.desc: Unseasonably cold summer weather causes difficulties for several animals in the Yorkshire Dales and North York Moors, including an injured roe deer and her twins. High up in Malham Cove, two 40-day-old peregrines must learn how to fly, while south of the North York Moors National Park, a pair of grebes carry their youngsters around on their backs.(n)

programme.title: When Celebrity Goes Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: Contributors including Union J's Jaymi Hensley, Vanessa Feltz, Carole Malone, Adam Rickitt and Carol Decker recall the popstars, actors, comedians and even astronauts embroiled in everything from sex scandals to televised meltdowns. Unflattering episodes featured include Jimmy Carr's public shaming for tax avoidance, Naomi Campbell's blood diamond debacle, Justin Lee Collins's career-stopping harassment conviction and Leo Sayer's clean pants rant in the Celebrity Big Brother house. Plus, Dustin Diamond, of Saved by the Bell fame, reveals the truth behind his ill-judged sex tape and veteran newsreader Ed Mitchell describes how alcoholism left him homeless.(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: One of the most celebrated horror films of the late '70s is given a new look in this remake, produced by blockbuster filmmaker Michael Bay. George and Kathy Lutz (Ryan Reynolds and Melissa George) are a young couple who are looking for a new home, and think they've found a dream house in Amityville, Long Island -- a large and beautiful home available at a bargain price. George thinks that there must be a catch, and learns that the house has a dark history -- a year before, a man living in the house murdered his family in their sleep, claiming he was commanded to commit the crime by demons. Shrugging off stories that the house is haunted, George and Kathy move in with their three kids, only to discover that something evil lurks within the house, and even Father McNamara (Philip Baker Hall), an expert on possession, is powerless to clear the dark spirits from the home. The Amityville Horror was based on the same book by Jay Anson that provided the basis for the 1979 film, which in turn documented an actual incident(n)

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: Freddie Harris arranges for a group of six local students to spend the night in the childhood home of Michael Myers... Little does he know that Myers has returned home for Halloween..(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Cigar-chomping demon Hellboy (Ron Perlman), the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's secret weapon against things that go bump in the night, returns to battle a supernatural prince with an ancient grudge against puny humans. Writer-director Guillermo del Toro's sequel improves on his original, showcasing wickedly elegant monsters and spectacular action sequences(n)

programme.title: Run Fatboy Run
programme.desc: David Schwimmer's debut directorial feature stars Simon Pegg as Dennis Doyle, seen in the film's opening sequence abandoning a very pregnant Libby Odell at the altar. Five years later, he's an overweight security guard with limited access rights to their son Jake, but still holding a torch for her. When he finds she has a new boyfriend, superfit all-round jock Whit, he decides to win her back by entering the same charity marathon as Whit and beating him. With coaching from his landlord and encouragement of sorts from his friend Gordon, he sets off over the start line but has he prepared enough to make it to the finish?(n)

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: Susan Sarandon, Michelle Pfeiffer and Cher star in this Oscar nominated comedy as three bored, single women who dream of a man that can satisfy their desires. But when a filthy rich, mysterious man arrives in their lives, things start to get interesting(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton has a blast as the foul-mouthed safecracker who dresses up as a department store Santa, then robs the joint(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: Two suburban parents hire a new babysitter to look after their three kids while they enjoy a night out, but the sitter eventually reveals herself to be an unhinged imposter who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child(n)

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: Dahlia and daughter Ceci are happy in their New York apartment until stagnant water begins to seep through the roof. Is someone - or something - living upstairs? Psychological horror from the author of The Ring(n)

programme.title: The X-Files: I Want to Believe
programme.desc: A priest's visions bring FBI agents Mulder (David Duchovny) and Scully (Gillian Anderson) back together for an investigation involving the mysterious disappearance of a group of women. Chris Carter directed the second big-screen film inspired by the classic TV series(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: Director Roger Michell follows up the hit romantic comedy Notting Hill with this thought-provoking thriller. Ben Affleck and Samuel L. Jackson star, respectively, as Gavin Banek and Doyle Gibson, two New York men whose lives become accidentally intertwined in a Good Friday fender bender on the FDR Drive. Late for a crucial appointment, hotshot lawyer Gavin tosses Doyle a blank check and leaves the scene, while Doyle, whose car is inoperable, is late for a court-appointed custody hearing. A recovering alcoholic, Doyle's tardiness doesn't sit well with the judge, who - sick of waiting for Gipson - grants custody to Doyle's ex-wife in Doyle's absence. The situation worsens when it becomes evident that Doyle has an equally important file belonging to Gavin, which proves that an elderly man gave Banek's firm power-of-attorney over his foundation. So begins an escalating war of words and deeds between the two men. Soon, egged on by an associate, Gavin hires a "fixer" to destroy Doyle's credit, forcing Doyle to fire back with some cunning moves of his own(n)

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: In this tense thriller, a young girl with asthma is kidnapped and held for ransom, but her captors tell her parents that they'll deprive the child of her medication unless they comply with their terms, one of which is not to contact the police(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: The explosive third installment of the popular franchise featuring Matt Damon as Jason Bourne, a CIA-trained assassin suffering from amnesia. In this dynamic thrill ride, he's on a quest to discover his true identity and how he became a consummate killer(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: FBI agents investigating a series of bank robberies initially suspect that the business's owner might be responsible, but they later realise that the heists point toward a much-larger conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Two fighters who never made it to the championships receive one final chance at glory in this boxing road movie. But their purse requires them to be ready to rumble in Vegas in less than five hours(n)

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: An English writer named Basil arrives on the isle of Crete in the hopes of realigning his values and outlook on life. He is "adopted" by the flamboyant Zorba, who decides to educate Basil in the ways of the world. Eventually, Zorba convinces Basil that failure is an inescapable part of life, and that only by constantly tasting defeat can one truly enjoy life's victories(n)

programme.title: Tremors II: Aftershocks
programme.desc: After undermining half of Mexico in the original movie, the Graboids are back to commit more tunnelling terror(n)

programme.title: Rails & Ties
programme.desc: A deadly collision between a train and car lead to an unlikely bond between the train engineer and a young boy who escapes the carnage(n)

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Adaptation of the TV series set in the 1960s, detailing the first pairing of American agent Napoleon Solo with Russian operative Illya Kuryakin(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Tom Cruise returns as both producer and agent Ethan Hunt in his second action-adventure adaptation of the television series. Directed by John Woo, the action speeds across the continents, as Ethan accepts his latest mission: retrieve and destroy the supply of a genetically modified disease called Chimera, as well as recover the cure, Bellerophon, from of a group of terrorists led by Sean Ambrose. For the mission to succeed, Ethan must persuade jewel thief Nyah Hall to join him, which he does by nearly running her car off a cliff. When Nyah becomes infected with the disease, Ethan must battle to save the woman he now loves, even if that means sending her into enemy territory, and the hands of her ex-boyfriend. Also starring Ving Rhames. Edited for violence and language(n)

programme.title: The Pianist
programme.desc: When the Germans invade Poland, a celebrated pianist loses his job because he is Jewish, but as the Nazis tighten their grip on Warsaw, his family are thrown out of their home and forced to live in the ghetto. As conditions turn even more nightmarish, the pianist hides in the ruined city, dodging the squads who carry off Jews to the death camps. Based on the true story of pianist Wladyslaw Szpilman(n)

programme.title: Ghost World
programme.desc: Two highschool friends,Enid and Rebecca, on the verge of leaving their adolescence behind, try to decide what to do with their lives.Enid discovers a kindred spirit in fellow misfit Seymour, who shares her disgust with the world around them(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy concerning four high-school friends who vow to lose their virginity by prom night(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(n)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Tongue-in-cheek horror tale in which a small Nevada desert town is terrorised by giant man-eating worms. Two handymen are forced to postpone their plans to escape their humdrum lives after several mysterious deaths and a series of earthquakes turn out to be the work of predatory subterranean creatures which lay siege to the terrified townsfolk(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: One of the most celebrated horror films of the late '70s is given a new look in this remake, produced by blockbuster filmmaker Michael Bay. George and Kathy Lutz (Ryan Reynolds and Melissa George) are a young couple who are looking for a new home, and think they've found a dream house in Amityville, Long Island -- a large and beautiful home available at a bargain price. George thinks that there must be a catch, and learns that the house has a dark history -- a year before, a man living in the house murdered his family in their sleep, claiming he was commanded to commit the crime by demons. Shrugging off stories that the house is haunted, George and Kathy move in with their three kids, only to discover that something evil lurks within the house, and even Father McNamara (Philip Baker Hall), an expert on possession, is powerless to clear the dark spirits from the home. The Amityville Horror was based on the same book by Jay Anson that provided the basis for the 1979 film, which in turn documented an actual incident(n)

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: Freddie Harris arranges for a group of six local students to spend the night in the childhood home of Michael Myers... Little does he know that Myers has returned home for Halloween..(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Cigar-chomping demon Hellboy (Ron Perlman), the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's secret weapon against things that go bump in the night, returns to battle a supernatural prince with an ancient grudge against puny humans. Writer-director Guillermo del Toro's sequel improves on his original, showcasing wickedly elegant monsters and spectacular action sequences(n)

programme.title: Run Fatboy Run
programme.desc: David Schwimmer's debut directorial feature stars Simon Pegg as Dennis Doyle, seen in the film's opening sequence abandoning a very pregnant Libby Odell at the altar. Five years later, he's an overweight security guard with limited access rights to their son Jake, but still holding a torch for her. When he finds she has a new boyfriend, superfit all-round jock Whit, he decides to win her back by entering the same charity marathon as Whit and beating him. With coaching from his landlord and encouragement of sorts from his friend Gordon, he sets off over the start line but has he prepared enough to make it to the finish?(n)

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: Susan Sarandon, Michelle Pfeiffer and Cher star in this Oscar nominated comedy as three bored, single women who dream of a man that can satisfy their desires. But when a filthy rich, mysterious man arrives in their lives, things start to get interesting(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton has a blast as the foul-mouthed safecracker who dresses up as a department store Santa, then robs the joint(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: Two suburban parents hire a new babysitter to look after their three kids while they enjoy a night out, but the sitter eventually reveals herself to be an unhinged imposter who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child(n)

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: Dahlia and daughter Ceci are happy in their New York apartment until stagnant water begins to seep through the roof. Is someone - or something - living upstairs? Psychological horror from the author of The Ring(n)

programme.title: The X-Files: I Want to Believe
programme.desc: A priest's visions bring FBI agents Mulder (David Duchovny) and Scully (Gillian Anderson) back together for an investigation involving the mysterious disappearance of a group of women. Chris Carter directed the second big-screen film inspired by the classic TV series(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Crime Family. The Mob is demystified in the A&E program American Justice: Crime Family. Host Bill Kurtis takes the viewer into the heart of the New York underworld to examine the long arms of the Genovese family. Started when Vito Genovese worked under Lucky Luciano, the notorious family has a firm grip on syndicated crime. A&E presents rare footage of the gangster clan and its shady leaders. For years, police have pursued the Genovese, but they remain frustratingly immune to arrest. Hear from the prosecutors who have made their capture a full-time job and the historians who will explain why the Genovese will never die(n)

Terry's new approach to management quickly receives its first test when head of HR Dave `Dotcom' reports one member of the team has been drinking on duty - an offense that has already earned him the sack once. With a breathalyser in hand, Terry prepares to have a stern word with his unruly employee. programme.title: Upstairs Downstairs
programme.sub-title: A Faraway Country About Which We Know Nothing.
programme.desc: Drama and intrigue with the aristocrats and serving staff of 165 Eaton Place as it opens its doors once more. September 1938, and as dark clouds gather over Europe, Hallam's preoccupation with Nazi Germany leads him into dangerous waters overseas. Back home, Lady Agnes is frail following the birth of her second child, and finds great support in the forthright Aunt Blanche, who has made herself comfortable at Eaton Place following the funeral of her sister Lady Holland. In the servants' quarters, Rose is taken ill with TB, so the staff welcome spirited new maid Beryl, who catches Harry's eye, while events upstairs end in a startling revelation about Mr Pritchard. Keeley Hawes, Ed Stoppard, Alex Kingston and Adrian Scarborough star.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monkeys Revealed
programme.desc: Zoologist George McGavin explores the world of primates, from strange lemurs and acrobatic monkeys to enigmatic apes. He uncovers the secrets of the primates' success - their survival tactics and physical adaptations - and how their lives mirror those of their human cousins. He begins by meeting an orang-utan that uses soap to improve its personal hygiene, baboons with a taste for flamingos, criminal-minded macaques and fluorescent mandrills that don warpaint before going into battle.(n)

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef
programme.desc: An exploration of Australia's underwater ecosystem, one of the natural wonders of the world and the largest living structure on the planet. In the first of three programmes, marine biologist Monty Halls examines the complex form of the coral reef itself and the wildlife that lives on it, from deadly fish-hunting snails and sharks that can walk on land to fighting corals and parrotfish, which cocoon themselves every night.(n)

programme.title: Coast
programme.desc: The team travels from Muckle Flugga in the Shetlands to the Old Man of Hoy on Orkney. Historian Neil Oliver investigates the story of the freedom fighters who undertook missions in Nazi-occupied Germany during the Second World War, while anthropologist Dr Alice Roberts examines a mysterious skeleton that reveals intriguing clues as to the lifestyle of ancient Shetlanders.(n)

programme.title: Why Sharks Attack
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the unusual spate of deadly shark attacks that have gripped Australia in recent years. Do the creatures purposely target humans, or is each assault a tragic case of mistaken identity? Plus, a look at how great white sharks have begun appearing in growing numbers off the beaches of Cape Cod, Massachusetts - where they have rarely been seen for hundreds of years.(n)

programme.title: Monkeys Revealed
programme.desc: Zoologist George McGavin explores the world of primates, from strange lemurs and acrobatic monkeys to enigmatic apes. He uncovers the secrets of the primates' success - their survival tactics and physical adaptations - and how their lives mirror those of their human cousins. He begins by meeting an orang-utan that uses soap to improve its personal hygiene, baboons with a taste for flamingos, criminal-minded macaques and fluorescent mandrills that don warpaint before going into battle.(n)

programme.title: Galapagos
programme.desc: High-definition cameras and aerial photography techniques are used to explore the archipelago, which is rich in wildlife and made famous by Charles Darwin's On the Origin of the Species. This programme focuses on the geological history of the islands through the evidence of volcanic eruptions and examines what makes it unique. Tilda Swinton narrates.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough presents an exploration of Earth's vast seas, which cover 70 per cent of the planet's surface. In the first episode, millions of squid appear off the coast of California, gannets, whale sharks and dolphins hunt migrating sardines in the Indian Ocean, and thousands of turtles make the annual pilgrimage to lay their eggs in Costa Rica.(n)

programme.title: Operation Wild
programme.desc: Broadcaster Clare Balding and vet Steve Leonard travel the world to watch vets perform innovative life-saving operations on a variety of wild animals. This first edition features a baby panda called Zhu Xia in south-west China that needs an MRI scan, and rescued gorilla Shufai in Cameroon, who was shot by poachers when he was a baby. Plus, a manta ray on the Japanese island of Okinawa that needs an ultra-sound scan to determine if it's pregnant, and a four-ton elephant in Laos with a gunshot wound.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet

programme.title: Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: An energetic hound finds the ideal playmate in a tiger cub, and in Oklahoma, a pit-bull develops a tender bond with a steer.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monkeys Revealed
programme.desc: Zoologist George McGavin continues his exploration of the primate world, considering how the secret to their success is the ability to live in close-knit family and social groups. This is demonstrated by the emperor tamarin males conned into childcare in Peru and the South African vervet monkeys that have a sophisticated alarm system to protect them from predators. But living together often has its problems, like the Barbary macaques in Gibraltar who have their babies stolen by others out to impress their boss, the matriarchal ring-tailed lemur societies where females battle one another with their children in tow, and the hamadryas baboons of Ethiopia where the males rule with an iron fist.(n)

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef
programme.desc: Monty Halls explores the extraordinary ecosystem that covers an area larger than Great Britain, revealing that only seven per cent of it is coral reef. The rest is a variety of interconnected habitats, including hundreds of islands, mangrove swamps, deep-water gardens, vast sand flats, meadows of sea grass and what is said to be the world's oldest jungle. All are interconnected by a giant deep-water lagoon - and all are full of amazing wildlife.(n)

programme.title: Coast
programme.desc: The team travels along the south coast of England from Bournemouth to Plymouth, where Neil Oliver explores the pricey location of Sandbanks in Poole Harbour, and investigates how a lighthouse was built on the perilous Eddystone rocks. Alice Roberts discovers the formula for the perfect sandcastle, and Nicholas Crane meets a man whose home was destroyed 40 years ago by mudslides in Lyme Regis.(n)

programme.title: Sharks of the Coral Canyon
programme.desc: Documentary looking at the hunting behaviour of sharks, including footage of nighttime hunting, as well as the link they share with coral reefs.(n)

programme.title: Monkeys Revealed
programme.desc: Zoologist George McGavin continues his exploration of the primate world, considering how the secret to their success is the ability to live in close-knit family and social groups. This is demonstrated by the emperor tamarin males conned into childcare in Peru and the South African vervet monkeys that have a sophisticated alarm system to protect them from predators. But living together often has its problems, like the Barbary macaques in Gibraltar who have their babies stolen by others out to impress their boss, the matriarchal ring-tailed lemur societies where females battle one another with their children in tow, and the hamadryas baboons of Ethiopia where the males rule with an iron fist.(n)

programme.title: Galapagos
programme.desc: Examining the lesser-known parts of the islands and the species that have successfully evolved to suit the environment. The programme discovers how tortoise shells have changed shape, flowers have turned yellow to attract bees, and finches have become warblers. Plus, how flightless cormorants are still hunting underwater. Narrated by Tilda Swinton.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Camera crews journey to the deepest parts of the world's oceans to explore the lives of their inhabitants, including fearsome predators with huge teeth, strange jellyfish and deep-sea sharks that lurk among the gigantic submerged mountains and volcanos. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: All-action adventure spiced with humour in which a retired Special Forces colonel returns to action when a ruthless South American dictator kidnaps his 11-year-old daughter. Armed to the teeth, he sets out to bring her back, leaving a trail of destruction(n)

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Multi-Oscar-winning true story of an Austrian entrepreneur who sets out to profit from World War II by using cheap Jewish labour in his factory but finally risks everything to save his workers after seeing the scale of Nazi barbarity firsthand. An overwhelmingly powerful realisation of Thomas Keneally's bestseller 'Schindler's Ark', with vivid reconstructions of the Cracow ghetto and the death camps(n)

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with a British agent and an investigator to stop a global slave ring. Combining the martial arts prowess of international action superstar Jackie Chan with state-of-the-art special effects, The Medallion is an action comedy co-starring Claire Forlani, Lee Evans and Julian Sands. Chan plays Eddie Yang, a Hong Kong cop who suffers a near fatal accident while investigating a case involving a mysterious medallion. Eddie soon discovers that with the powerful medallion in his possession, he gains incredible speed, strength and skills, taking his martial arts abilities to awe-inspiring heights. Enlisting the help of an old flame, British Interpol agent Nicole James, Eddie is determined to learn the secret of the medallion and face down the evil crime lord Snakehead, who wants to use its awesome powers for his own nefarious plans(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: Kevin Caffery is a professional thief with taste and style who gets a tip for an easy heist: Billionaire tycoon Max Fairbanks' unoccupied beachfront mansion. But as Kevin is tossing Faberge eggs into his professional pillowcase, he finds himself face to face with the billionaire. Just before the cops drag Kevin away, Max spies Kevin's good-luck ring and decides to claim it as his own Only one problem...the ring was given to Kevin by his new love, and he is determined to get it back. How far will these two men go? As far as they have to. Even if it means divorce, public scandal, financial ruin, and prison. This battle of capitalist vs. robber escalates into a colossal tournament of egos threatening to take both men and everyone around them down(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military defense contractor (Bradley Cooper) is rehired by an old boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: Accidental Love
programme.desc: A waitress starts behaving strangely after she gets a nail stuck in her skull. Later, she falls for a dim-witted senator during a trip to Washington, D.C(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Two U.S. Marines in WWII are assigned to protect Navajo Marines who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher(n)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Bittersweet tale of six women in a small Louisiana town whose lives intersect at the local beauty parlour. The story deals with the changes - some of them painful and poignant, some of them hilarious - that the women experience over the course of several years. Based on Robert Harling's award-winning play(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military defense contractor (Bradley Cooper) is rehired by an old boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: White Men Can't Jump
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes and Woody Harrelson are the basketball hustlers on the courts of Venice Beach. Fantastic backchat and some nice passes too(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: The ultimate terrorist campaign -- steal a nuclear weapon and hold the world to ransom in this action thriller(n)

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Thriller about a police officer who learns that an escaped convict is a suitable bone marrow donor for his child, who is dying of leukaemia. He embarks upon a race to find the fugitive, a convicted killer, before he is recaptured by the authorities(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Edward Norton and Brad Pitt star in David Fincher's Oscar-nominated drama (adapted from Chuck Palahniuk's novel). Norton plays a bored executive who meets Tyler Durden (Pitt) on a plane. This mysterious stranger introduces him to a world of ennui-alleviating physical pain: Fight Club, a secretive society where men vent their frustrations in bare-knuckle fighting in dingy basements. But as Norton becomes more involved, he starts to learn about the shadowy and subversive organisation behind it all... Also starring Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf and Jared Leto(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Two U.S. Marines in WWII are assigned to protect Navajo Marines who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: American special forces commando Frank Dux goes AWOL to compete in the Kumite, a clandestine martial arts contest held in Hong Kong. Action(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: While out on a call, Roy Neary, a power repairman, witnesses' unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana home. This encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic events. Neary tries desperately to understand what he has experienced. He is baffled by the governmental cover-up that blocks his efforts, however, and finds himself increasingly driven to the emotional edge(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, Amity Island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A grumpy weatherman keeps waking up to the same 24 hours. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Edward Norton and Brad Pitt star in David Fincher's Oscar-nominated drama (adapted from Chuck Palahniuk's novel). Norton plays a bored executive who meets Tyler Durden (Pitt) on a plane. This mysterious stranger introduces him to a world of ennui-alleviating physical pain: Fight Club, a secretive society where men vent their frustrations in bare-knuckle fighting in dingy basements. But as Norton becomes more involved, he starts to learn about the shadowy and subversive organisation behind it all... Also starring Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf and Jared Leto(n)

programme.title: Tootsie
programme.desc: With a terrible reputation and no job offers in sight, desperate actor Michael Dorsey assumes the identity of a woman to get a part on a soap opera. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Egyptologist James Spader and gung-ho soldier Kurt Russell lead an expedition through the newly discovered and interpreted Stargate which leads to a distant planet ruled by the god Ra (Jaye Davidson). He created humanity but was locked off from dominating Earth by the absence of the Stargate. Now that the Stargate is open again, he's ready to return unless he can be stopped..(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: In this sprawling epic about America, a young man in 1860s New York City seeks to avenge his father's death decades earlier at the hands of a hardened gang leader during a large skirmish between warring clans. He befriends the brutal crime lord, gaining his trust in order to get close enough to exact revenge(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: In the frightmarish tradition of "The Blair Witch Project" comes this nerve-jangling chiller. Jennifer Carpenter is outstanding as a TV reporter who gets confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious, scary secret. It isn't long before she learns why someone was "screaming bloody murder." A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC." Directed by John Erick Dowdle, who cowrote the script with Drew Dowdle. Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech(n)

programme.title: Bruce Lee, the Legend
programme.desc: The documentary is a tribute to Bruce Lee, who is a master of martial arts(n)

programme.title: Earthquake
programme.desc: Spectacular effects are the attraction in this melodrama about people caught up in earthquake(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: A soldier leaves a monastery to take a mission to rescue his superior officer, who's been kidnapped somewhere in Iraq(n)

programme.title: The Killer Elite
programme.desc: Rollercoaster action thriller starring James Caan and Robert Duvall as two secret agents and friends who are part of a private organisation who end up as bitter enemies intent on killing each other(n)

programme.title: 5 Days of War
programme.desc: In the midst of an intense five-day war between Russia and the Georgian Republic, a rogue American journalist, his loyal cameraman, and a desperate local woman fight to reveal the truth about the atrocities being committed against innocent civilians. Andy Garcia, Val Kilmer, Rupert Friend, and Emmanuelle Chriqui star in this explosive war drama from Die Hard 2 director Renny Harlin(n)

programme.desc: Undercover Brother is recruited by the secret organisation called the B.R.O.T.H.E.R.H.O.O.D. to foil the attempts of The Man to destroy racial unity(n)

programme.desc: Hancock is a sarcastic, hard-living and misunderstood superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public. When Hancock grudgingly agrees to an extreme makeover from idealistic publicist Ray Embrey, his life and reputation rise from the ashes and all seems right again, until he meets a woman with similar powers to his and the key to his secret past(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: Left for dead by a gang of ruthless vampires who forced him to witness the slaughter of his own family, ex-Army Ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) vows to put every last one of the vicious bloodsuckers back in the ground where they belong. Later, as Shawn tracks down the hive's magnetic leader Cain (Vinnie Jones) and his loyal servant Vanya (Kat Von D), he realizes this is one job he can't handle on his own. Fortunately for Shawn, Reverend Ray (Michael Madsen) is there to help him realize his true potential as a "slayer", one of the few remaining humans with the power to defeat the living dead. DMX and Armand Assante co-star(n)

programme.desc: This 1987 release sees Arnold Schwarzenegger in a familiar role as the action hero leading a team of CIA hired mercenaries into the Central American jungle to take on an alien force. Guess who has to do it all on his own in the end?(n)

programme.desc: Conspiracy thriller starring Jeff Bridges as Professor Michael Faraday who teaches the activity of extreme right-wing groups. Recovering from the death of his wife, an FBI agent, he warms to his new neighbours, Oliver and Cheryl Lang. But their strange behaviour concerns him. Confused by their friendship and muddled by paranoia, he discovers some terrifying evidence that threatens the safety of his remaining family(n)

programme.title: Day Watch
programme.desc: Timur Bekmambetov's sequel to the Russian fantasy blockbuster Night Watch begins with Anton discovering his son Yegor has gone over to the dark side and is now one of the Great Others, who threatens the truce. When Yegor's tutor Olga is found killed, Anton is accused of murder by the Day Watch but a mind swap between him and the murdered woman offers him a chance of salvation if he can find an ancient warrior's tomb and the legendary Chalk of Fate, which can re-write history. As with the original, Bekmambetov's cinematic visions complement the fantasy of the film, from the start with a stupendous opening battle sequence, providing a feast for the eye as well as the mind. In Russian with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Detective Ryan Fields is killed in the island community of Broad Channel in Queens, where Nichols and Stevens are told by Rodgers that the victim met his death by a bullet to the head after his Kevlar vest stopped the first three shots. Also investigating is Internal Affairs captain Zoe Callas (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, joining the cast), who discovers that Fields' mobile phone records show a number of conversations with Jackie Dooley - a crime boss Nichols has been after for years.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the murder of a Russian prostitute - and discovers some very famous names on her list of clients. When one of the prime suspects is given an alibi by the FBI, she discovers he is a pawn in a larger investigation. The detective also struggles with her feelings for Fritz.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda looks into a series of gang shootings that appears to have been carried out by a military sniper. She accepts the help of a retired marine colonel when he comes forward with information about the murders - but begins to believe he knows more than he is letting on. Drama, with Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives hunt a killer responsible for murdering hospital patients by lacing pain medication with cyanide. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: After a reporter and his fiancee are gunned down outside a restaurant, Goren and Eames are given a seemingly reliable eyewitness description of the killer. However, while on the trail of their suspect, they discover the journalist was planning to publish an expose on corruption within the sanitation industry, taking their investigation in an entirely new direction.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is called to the scene when there is an attempt on the life of FBI agent TC Fornell, with the assailant identified as Navy seaman Tyler Brown. The pair team up and visit the bar where Brown worked and bump into their mutual ex-wife Diane Sterling, who was operating undercover as an employee suspected of stealing customers' identities. Joe Spano and Melinda McGraw guest star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Returning from a six-month posting in the Gulf, Navy lieutenant commander Megan Huffner opens her front door to find her husband Noel dead in his chair. Gibbs and the team investigate and find the victim died three or four weeks earlier, and an unusual $100 bill in his wallet proves to be a vital clue. Meanwhile, Tony's father visits for Christmas and looks to rebuild their fractured relationship. Guest starring Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: An investigation is launched into the murder of a psychiatrist involved in the trial of a drug designed to treat teenage depression and anxiety. Meanwhile, Brenda's squad learns she was charged with sexual misconduct in her previous job in Atlanta. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates when the daughter of a congresswoman is raped and murdered in her home, and is drawn into a seedy underworld. The evidence prompts her to examine the victim's sexual predilections - and uncovers a secret that could make her the next victim. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A plastic surgeon reports the disappearance of his wife, and Goren suspects there is more to the case than meets the eye, but struggles to find any flaws in the doctor's alibi. When body parts are found washed up on a beach, the detectives set a trap, placing a story in the papers claiming this could be the missing woman, to see how her husband reacts. Donna Hanover guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of a banker in a fire at his office. Discovering the sprinklers were disabled, Goren and Eames suspect arson. They track down the man who started the blaze - but he is killed while resisting arrest, leaving them with no clues as to who hired him. Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. A man and his son on a fishing trip hook what appears to be the body of a petty officer, but the dead man turns out to be a journalist who had been investigating the proliferation of drugs in the Navy. Meanwhile, Ziva returns to her car after a workout at the gym to find her father Eli hiding inside. Guest starring Michael Nouri.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Conclusion. After the deaths of two family members of NCIS employees, the team identifies the killer as a Swedish mercenary and the ballistics report reveals the bullets came from an Iranian arms dealer. McGee traces a wire transfer made to the hitman's ex-wife and son to an account under the name Virtue, and Ziva makes a connection after realising what the Hebrew translation is.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates when the daughter of a congresswoman is raped and murdered in her home, and is drawn into a seedy underworld. The evidence prompts her to examine the victim's sexual predilections - and uncovers a secret that could make her the next victim. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A plastic surgeon reports the disappearance of his wife, and Goren suspects there is more to the case than meets the eye, but struggles to find any flaws in the doctor's alibi. programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The murder of a gay man stirs political tension in the city, and Chief Pope tasks Brenda with bringing the killer to justice. However, she also has to contend with internal conflicts in the department, as Taylor undermines her authority and a team member actively works against her.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A doctor who works at an abortion clinic is shot in his apartment by a sniper, convincing the detectives a pro-life activist is to blame. An elderly couple who have chained themselves to a radiator in protest at the clinic's activities help the team, who face a race against time to catch the killer.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the case of a heart surgeon murdered during his son's bar mitzvah. Although they initially suspect someone with Mob connections, the detectives later discover another man's obsession puts him in the frame for the killing. Drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to the scene of a fatal car crash involving marine lance corporal Chad Dunn and student Lyla Cutwright. Duckie notices that the woman's injuries do not match the specifics of the accident and there are no skidmarks found at the scene, leading Gibbs to declare they possibly have a murder and a suicide on their hands. Abby calls in sick for the first time after the case stirs up a traumatic incident from her childhood. Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team capture computer hacker Ajay Khan, who was recently responsible for hacking into NCIS's supposedly ultra-secure multiple-threat alert centre. They believe he could hold the key to tracking down the most-wanted cyber terrorist in the world, who may be plotting an attack using a bomb containing a strain of the Ebola virus. When Khan refuses to co-operate, Ziva and DiNozzo take him to Guantanamo Bay to be placed with people he had previously betrayed. Guest starring Vik Sahay (Chuck).(n)

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: An itinerant ex-military investigator is tasked with solving a shooting spree that isn't quite as cut-and-dry as it first seems as author Lee Child's 2005 novel One Shot comes to the big screen courtesy of writer/director Christopher McQuarrie. When a crazed sniper guns down five seemingly random people on a crowded Pittsburgh riverfront, Det. Emerson (David Oyelowo) quickly amasses enough evidence at the scene to implicate an unstable ex-military sniper named James Barr (Joseph Sikora). Upon being questioned by Emerson and DA Alex Rodin (Richard Jenkins), however, Barr demands to speak with Jack Reacher (Tom Cruise). A former military investigator who fell off the grid following his service, Reacher soon shows up on the scene and begins gathering clues with the aid of talented defense attorney Helen Rodin (Rosamund Pike), the daughter of the DA. Meanwhile, when Reacher is assaulted in a local bar, he correctly surmises that someone is determined to impede his investigation. His theory plays out when he becomes the prime suspect in the murder of a young woman shortly thereafter. Now, with the police closing in from one side and a gang of ruthless killers gaining ground on the other, Reacher must use his formidable detective skills in order to catch the gunman and uncover his true motives(n)

programme.title: Marvel's The Avengers
programme.desc: Marvel Studios delivers the ultimate comic-book film, which ties together such characters as Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), Captain America (Chris Evans), The Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), and Thor (Chris Hemsworth) for a big-screen franchise team-up like no other. Taking center stage this time is Nick Fury (played once again by the note-perfect Samuel L. Jackson), leader of the peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D. Fury, along with former Russian spy Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson), recruits a super team to combat Thor's ever-deceptive brother Loki (Tom Hiddleston) after he brainwashes ace archer Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) while stealing a cosmic cube from an underground base. Thus the heroes must learn to work together alongside outlaw scientist Bruce Banner (Ruffalo), who can track down the artifact's gamma signals when he's not hulking out into a giant green monster. Show runner Joss Whedon (Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Firefly) adapted and helmed the script by Zak Penn(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpson Safari. The Simpsons win an African safari vacation and get more than they bargained for(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: A vengeful father comes to the aid of a mother, her teenage daughter, and a defenseless young couple on the one night of the year that all crime, including murder, is legal in this self-contained sequel from co-producer Jason Blum and original Purge writer/director James DeMonaco. As the countdown to the Purge starts ticking, struggling waitress Eva (Carmen Ejogo) risks her safety by staying late at work to ask her boss for a raise. Later, as she returns home to her elderly father (John Beasley) and daughter Cali (Zoë Soul), bickering couple Shane (Zach Gilford) and Liz (Kiele Sanchez) attempt to make their way out of the city following a frightening run-in with a gang of masked, machete-wielding thugs. While these five people are eager to seek sanctuary from the impending wave of violence about to flood the streets, a lone stranger (Frank Grillo) intent on seeking vengeance for the wrongful death of his son plans to draw blood from the man responsible. Armed to the teeth as he cruises the city in a modified muscle car, he gets sidetracked from his mission when he sees Eva and Cali fighting for their lives against a small army of black-clad soldiers. Against his better judgment, he rescues the pair, only realizing later that Shane and Liz also jumped into his backseat in order to escape a gang that disabled their car and were hunting them through the streets. When the stranger's car is similarly damaged beyond the point of repair, this unlikely group must stick together in order to survive the night. But little do they realize that their nightmare has only just begun(n)

programme.desc: Evil forces threaten the peace of Middle-earth. Dark riders from Sauron search for the ring which will give him absolute power. And Frodo Baggins, nephew of dragon-hunting Bilbo, must take the ring on a quest to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.desc: Rome-Old and Juli-Eh. Grandpa Simpson is moved out of the Springfield Retirement Castle and into the Simpson family home in a bid to save Homer cash. The move brings Grandpa closer to Selma and love blossoms between the unlikely pair. Meanwhile Lisa and Bart cause mischief with a bunch of complimentary shipping boxes(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: That 90s Show. Homer reminisces about how he gave up his dreams of being a musician so that Marge could go to Springfield University. After she became attracted to one of her professors, Homer started channelling his emotions into his music and formed the first grunge band, Sadgasm(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: My Fare Lady. Tired of chauffeuring her kids around, Marge takes a job as a driver for a transportation company. Meanwhile, Homer fills in at Moe's one night and costs the bar owner so much that Moe's forced to work a temp job as a janitor at the plant(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Barthood. Bart's coming-of-age chronicle, told ala the big-screen hit "Boyhood," follows him from a 6-year-old to his maturing into an accomplished young man. Along the way, there are glimpses of how his father and sister impacted him more than he could ever realise(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Sad and the Drugly
programme.desc: The Good, the Sad and the Drugly. Hollywood actress Anne Hathaway heads to Springfield. Bart is forced to visit Grampa at the retirement home and is smitten by a girl named Jenny(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Archer Vice: Smugglers' Blues. Archer embarks on a secret mission to Colombia(n)

programme.title: The Last Sunset
programme.desc: A wanted murderer travels to Mexico to see the now-married love of his life, little realising he is being pursued by a determined sheriff. However, both the outlaw and the lawman end up working for the woman's husband on a cattle drive. Western, starring Rock Hudson, Kirk Douglas, Dorothy Malone and Joseph Cotten.(n)

programme.title: Arabian Nights
programme.desc: The story of two half-brothers - one the heroic caliph, the other an evil usurper - as they do battle for the right to rule their kingdom, and win the hand of beautiful dancer Sherazade. Adaptation of the classic adventure tales, starring Jon Hall, Maria Montez, Sabu and Leif Erickson.(n)

programme.title: Two Rode Together
programme.desc: The desperate relatives of people captured by Comanches many years before put pressure on the US military to bring them home. The army hires a cynical frontier marshal, who agrees to negotiate their release in return for a commission. But the townsfolk are forced to face some grim truths when he returns with just one unrecognisable captive. John Ford's Western, with James Stewart, Richard Widmark and Shirley Jones.(n)

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson are asked to protect the last remaining member of the aristocratic Baskerville family, who is believed to be the target of a monstrous spectral hound roaming the remote Devon moors. Hammer version of Arthur Conan Doyle's mystery, starring Peter Cushing, Andre Morrell, Christopher Lee, John Le Mesurier and Miles Malleson.(n)

programme.title: Post Grad
programme.desc: A university graduate finds her career does not take off as quickly as planned. When her dream job falls through, she is forced to return to her eccentric family. An encounter with an attractive new neighbour brightens things up, to the dismay of a besotted friend, who considers getting a degree of his own. Comedy, with Alexis Bledel, Zach Gilford and Michael Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Free Fire Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Ben Wheatley and stars Armie Hammer, Cillian Murphy, Sharlto Copley and Michael Smiley talk about making the new crime thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: A New York stockbroker rises from unemployment to become one of the richest men in the city's financial elite through an illegal scheme to defraud investors. His wealth brings him an outrageously debauched lifestyle, but comes at a price as the FBI become suspicious of his manipulation of the markets. Martin Scorsese's fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill and Matthew McConaughey.(n)

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A single TV producer is appalled when a chauvinistic presenter is hired for her morning news show. However, she is forced to seek his help when she meets the man of her dreams, and begins testing his theories on what men find attractive. Romantic comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Katherine Heigl, Bree Turner and Eric Winter.(n)

programme.title: Gentlemen Broncos
programme.desc: A teenager trying to publish a sci-fi novel gives a draft of the manuscript to his favourite author, hoping to get feedback. Unfortunately for him, the pompous writer passes the work off as his own - so he sets out to prove he is the true creator. Comedy from the director of Napoleon Dynamite, starring Michael Angarano, Jemaine Clement and Sam Rockwell.(n)

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Wealthy eccentric Sir Vincent Brampton arrives in Nairobi intent on hunting a legendary man-eating lion, and employs the services of disgraced big-game hunter Ken Duffield, who decides to use the expedition as an opportunity to settle an old score with the ruthless Kenyan terrorist who murdered his son. Adventure set during the Mau Mau Uprising in Kenya, starring Victor Mature, Roland Culver and Earl Cameron.(n)

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An American tank crew get lost in the desert during the retreat from El Alamein and face a desperate race against time to reach a source of water in an abandoned fortress - only to discover the Nazis are heading for the same location. Second World War melodrama which is all the more effective thanks to the straightforward nature of the plot and action. Humphrey Bogart, J Carrol Naish, Dan Duryea and Rex Ingram are among the excellent cast.(n)

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: Confederate agent James Farraday steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees. But smuggling it south through enemy territory proves more difficult, especially with detective Frank Kelso on his back, treacherous scout Brett Manning double-crossing him, and nurse Nora Curtis to protect. Western, starring Van Johnson, Jeff Morrow and Joanne Dru.(n)

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: An American war correspondent joins Allied troops in 1944 as they prepare for their landing in Italy. A strategic blunder by their commanding officer gives German forces time to reinforce the area, leaving the reporter caught up in one of the campaign's fiercest battles. Second World War drama, starring Robert Mitchum, Peter Falk, Arthur Kennedy, Robert Ryan and Earl Holliman.(n)

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: A couple whose daughter develops leukaemia have another child to eventually provide a donor organ for her sister. However, as the younger child enters her teens and learns why she was born, she rejects the arrangement and hires a lawyer to seek legal separation from her parents. Drama, starring Cameron Diaz, Abigail Breslin and Alec Baldwin.(n)

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Premiere. Retired composer Fred takes a holiday in the Alps with his lifelong friend, writer and director Mick. Fred is determined to turn his back on music, despite the entreaties of his daughter and a request from the Queen, but Mick is determined to complete one last screenplay, in honour of a woman who inspired him. Comedy drama, starring Michael Caine, Harvey Keitel, Rachel Weisz and Jane Fonda.(n)

programme.title: Wanderlust
programme.desc: A Manhattan resident loses his job, so he and his wife leave the city in search of a fresh start. During their journey, they stumble on a commune of hippies and decide to join until they have decided what to do with their lives. However, living without the comforts of the modern world proves harder than expected. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston, Paul Rudd and Alan Alda.(n)

programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver rustles up simple, seasonal dishes and demonstrates how to cook using home-grown potatoes. Among the dishes on the menu are Spanish omelette and a roast chicken tray bake with tomatoes. Outside in the garden, Brian shows how tasty spuds can be cultivated in the smallest of spaces.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: Having sampled some of America's most diverse dietary offerings, Jamie Oliver sets out in search of the country's cheapest culinary treats. In Georgia, he meets family members who have been growing, killing and cooking their own food for generations, and asks them to lend him their expertise at a barbecue contest in Florida. He also encounters the cake-baking Sex and Savannah women, and visits a soul food restaurant struggling to survive in harsh financial times.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes an Italian meatloaf, and a no-bake mac and four cheeses, served with a simple green salad, before preparing slice cookies and ice cream sundaes.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree prepares strawberry lemonade and scalloped potatoes and ham with a side of lemony green beans for the family.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Ching-He Huang takes two taxi drivers to London's Chinatown, where she demonstrates the wide variety of chilli-based products available on the market. She then teaches them how to cook tiger prawns with shiitake mushrooms and rice wine, and a Chinese take on fish and chips.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Ching-He Huang meets two estate agents from Bridlington. East Yorkshire, taking them to visit London's Chinatown to search for the oriental store-cupboard staples groundnut oil and sesame oil. She then teaches them how to prepare Sichuan-style sweet-and-sour prawns and three-cup chicken, before challenging them to repeat her recipes.(n)

programme.title: Spring Baking Championship
programme.desc: The final three bakers create snacks for a groom's welcome basket, before creating wedding cakes inspired by Mexico, Hawaii and Italy.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: The crusading chef reaches the final stop on his tour, a Navajo reservation in Arizona. Here, he encounters some of the country's oldest culinary traditions, and is given a crash course in the tribe's spirituality. However, he is disappointed to see the extent to which Navajo children are becoming reliant on junk food, and sets out to help them embrace their heritage by introducing them to Native American versions of fast food.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver cooks using peppers and chillies. The menu includes a spicy pork goulash and an experimental dish of smoked salmon with a zingy salsa. He also joins Brian for a taste-test of the hottest chilli in the world - and it is the loyal gardener who keeps his cool.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Celebrity chef Jamie Oliver uses wild mushrooms picked in his local forest to rustle up simple dishes including risotto, bruschetta and a venison and funghi stroganoff. His mentor Gennaro Contaldo explains the dangers of some varieties, before sampling the recipes.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri travels to St Louis to visit a New Orleans roadhouse serving rice and beans, cajun pot-stickers and pulled pork pasta.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits a traditional pasta institution in Syracuse making a tomato sauce just for dipping, and spicy chicken, duck and cheese pizza.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri checks out the food scene in Cuba, including a Soviet establishment serving authentic Russian fare.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits food hot spots in Havana, including a place cooking house-cured lamb, and a house-turned-restaurant dishing out savoury goat stew.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Willie Degal visits the Lexington Grille and Pub in Bardonia, New York where he attempts to save the restaurant from a total collapse by reigning in the out-of-control staff.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The co-owner of German restaurant Speiskammer, Alameda, worries that his staff hired by her ex-husband could be more trouble than they are worth.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The owner of Bistro Baffi asks Charles Stiles and the team to help when several expensive bottles of wine go missing from his restaurant.(n)

programme.title: The Great Comic Relief Bake Off
programme.desc: Life's Too Short star Warwick Davis, Dragons' Den panellist Duncan Bannatyne, adventurer and broadcaster Simon Reeve and former Blue Peter presenter Andy Akinwolere enter the tent. They try their hands at a signature bake of iced biscuits before attempting pastry for the first time and finish with one of the contestants delivering the smallest cake ever seen on Bake Off. Mel Giedroyc oversees proceedings, with Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry judging the celebrities' efforts. Plus, another report from Lorraine Pascale in Ghana showing how the money raised by the charity initiative can make a big difference.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Monica Galetti and Michel Roux Jr oversee proceedings as six chefs battle it out in the quarter-final, preparing a dish of their own invention from a range of ingredients including neck of lamb, rabbit, chorizo and rhubarb. Only four contestants will make it to the next challenge, in which they have to cook two courses for food critics William Sitwell, Tracey MacLeod and Charles Campion - with two going through to the semi-finals.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers examine food found in British woodlands, preparing a wild boar ragu and a creamy fool with brambles picked from a hedgerow. They also explore the long history of poaching in the UK and show which plants can be used to make medicine.(n)

programme.title: Eat Well for Less
programme.desc: MasterChef judge Gregg Wallace and greengrocer Chris Bavin set out to help families with their food shopping, beginning with the Booths from Lancashire. Mum Jenny claims to be cautious at the supermarket, always looking out for the best deals, but dad Howerd's impulse buys mean they always end up paying more than they should. Now they want to save £40 a week so they can build a home extension. Gregg and Chris start out by spying on the couple during their weekly shop - and are surprised by what they see.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's India
programme.desc: The chef visits a five-star hotel in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, employing local housewives for genuine home-cooked dishes and samples chettinad chicken, a dish inspired by spices brought back from both East and West by merchants. In Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, he meets India's first MasterChef winner, and marks the end of his culinary journey with a small gathering of friends at his bungalow to reveal the outcome of his search for the perfect curry.(n)

programme.title: The Great Comic Relief Bake Off
programme.desc: Life's Too Short star Warwick Davis, Dragons' Den panellist Duncan Bannatyne, adventurer and broadcaster Simon Reeve and former Blue Peter presenter Andy Akinwolere enter the tent. They try their hands at a signature bake of iced biscuits before attempting pastry for the first time and finish with one of the contestants delivering the smallest cake ever seen on Bake Off. Mel Giedroyc oversees proceedings, with Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry judging the celebrities' efforts. Plus, another report from Lorraine Pascale in Ghana showing how the money raised by the charity initiative can make a big difference.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Monica Galetti and Michel Roux Jr oversee proceedings as six chefs battle it out in the quarter-final, preparing a dish of their own invention from a range of ingredients including neck of lamb, rabbit, chorizo and rhubarb. Only four contestants will make it to the next challenge, in which they have to cook two courses for food critics William Sitwell, Tracey MacLeod and Charles Campion - with two going through to the semi-finals.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers examine food found in British woodlands, preparing a wild boar ragu and a creamy fool with brambles picked from a hedgerow. They also explore the long history of poaching in the UK and show which plants can be used to make medicine.(n)

programme.title: Eat Well for Less
programme.desc: MasterChef judge Gregg Wallace and greengrocer Chris Bavin set out to help families with their food shopping, beginning with the Booths from Lancashire. Mum Jenny claims to be cautious at the supermarket, always looking out for the best deals, but dad Howerd's impulse buys mean they always end up paying more than they should. Now they want to save £40 a week so they can build a home extension. Gregg and Chris start out by spying on the couple during their weekly shop - and are surprised by what they see.(n)

programme.title: Choccywoccydoodah
programme.desc: The team creates cakes for two couples, one just starting out on their life together and another reaching journey's end.(n)

programme.title: The Great Sport Relief Bake Off
programme.desc: Broadcaster Anita Rani, singer and fashion designer Pearl Lowe, BBC weatherman Alex Deakin and historian Alex Langlands compete in the third and final heat of the 2012 charity special. They begin by preparing a classic crumble, then bake a coffee and walnut cake, followed by 24 miniature tarts, all for the approval of Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry. Mel Giedroyc presents.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Eight more contenders enter the kitchen, where Monica Galetti and Gregg Wallace challenge them to make a dish of their own invention using a selection of seven ingredients - including pork sausage, squash, Gorgonzola, walnuts and almonds. They each have just one hour to hold their nerve and demonstrate their creativity to the judges.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Down Under
programme.desc: Adam Liaw takes viewers on a culinary journey to Australia, offering an insight into the country's food and culture, as well as the people he meets along the way.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers celebrate Britain's taste for exotic food, one of the driving forces of its culinary history. They prepare chilli gingerbread and demonstrate how to make perfect sushi, travel to Tatton Park in Cheshire to learn why pineapples were once extremely expensive and reveal the history of the Onion Johnnie Man.(n)

programme.title: Eat Well for Less
programme.desc: MasterChef judge Gregg Wallace and greengrocer Chris Bavin set out to help families with their food shopping, showing them simple and effective ways to save money on their current bill, continuing with the Warners from Stratford-upon-Avon, whose weekly spending is out of control. With their limited cooking skills, Hannah and Tim rely on pre-prepared food, and assume that if something is expensive it must be better. Gregg and Chris spy on their shopping habits to see where the couple are going wrong, then give them further advice on cutting their shopping bill while ensuring their food is healthy. Plus, dietician Lucy Jones reveals the difference in the amounts of sugar present in various jars of tomato pasta sauce.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall cooks using produce from Britain's abundant spring harvest, including asparagus, artichokes and lamb. The shepherd's pie recipe is taste-tested against Delia Smith's cheat version with surprising results, and five Bristol families are challenged to turn an acre of city land into an urban smallholding. Plus, an update on the Chicken Out! campaign.(n)

programme.desc: American Health Care Act. The American Health Care Act proposed by Republicans; International Women's Day; and Wikileaks' CIA document dump are discussed(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: In a side-splitting film that brings together some of comedy's sharpest talent, 30 Rock star Tina Fey, Amy Poehler and writer/director Michael McCullers join forces to tell the story of two women, one apartment and the nine months that will change their lives. The always winning and wry Fey portrays a focused and driven New York career woman who desperately wants a baby but is physically unable to carry the child herself. Undaunted, she recruits a South Philly working girl (Poehler) to act as her surrogate. Everything goes according to plan until a pregnant Poehler shows up on Fey's doorstep with no place to live, and suddenly two very different women are joined together to create a very unexpected family(n)

programme.title: Vice News Tonight
programme.desc: Episode 103. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant runs into an old high-school classmate, an overweight loser-turned-muscular CIA agent, and ends up helping him with a crucial mission involving the hacking of U.S. spy satellites in this outrageous action comedy(n)

programme.title: Rock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: A chronicle of a 16-week boot camp for incarcerated young people run by the Miami-Dade County Corrections and Rehabilitation Department that aims to make them constructive members of society who are less likely to return to prison. Dwayne Johnson is an executive producer(n)

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Burning Love. Madeline worries about Jane and the can of worms she opened. Meanwhile, Jane confronts Renata; Bonnie tells Nathan about Abigail's secret project; and Ed and Madeline have a candid conversation about the lack of passion in their marriage(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Zookeeper's Wife'
programme.desc: A look at "The Zookeeper's Wife," a 2017 drama based on Diane Ackerman's nonfiction book about a couple who used the Warsaw Zoo to save hundreds of Jews during the German occupation of Poland during World War II. The film stars Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Brühl, and is directed by Niki Caro(n)

programme.title: Within

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: American Health Care Act. The American Health Care Act proposed by Republicans; International Women's Day; and Wikileaks' CIA document dump are discussed(n)

programme.title: Unlocking the Cage
programme.desc: Animal-rights lawyer Steven Wise and his Nonhuman Rights Project are the focus of this documentary directed by Chris Hegedus and D.A. Pennebaker. Wise and his team endeavor to provide limited personhood rights for relatively intelligent animals such as chimpanzees, whales, and elephants, which would protect the creatures against captivity and abuse(n)

programme.desc: Upbeat musical spin on John Waters' 1988 cult hit about a plump, socially conscious teenage girl who shakes up things on a TV dance show in 1962 Baltimore(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: Atmospheric sci-fi suspense story about a team of astronauts sent on a rescue mission to the red planet to bring back survivors of the first manned landing on Mars. The first crew appear to have met with a mysterious disaster and when the rescuers arrive on the planet they find that Mars may not be as dead as the human race have assumed(n)

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Two slow-witted wrestling fans, appalled at wrestling's abandonment of their slamdown idol Jimmy King, resolve to restore his tarnished crown. A brash, gross-out, knockabout comedy(n)

programme.title: Nights in Rodanthe
programme.desc: A doctor is en route to reconcile with his estranged son when his benevolent mission is sidelined upon checking into a North Carolina beach-town inn. When the doctor arrives at the inn, he enters into a passionate affair with an unhappily married woman who is currently considering divorce. Network Television Premiere(n)

programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip in this incredibly raunchy comedy(n)

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: In this chilling sequel, two young brothers must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies(n)

Samuel L. Jackson gives a charged performance in this drama about a disillusioned teacher who leaves the East Coast after being stabbed several times by a student. He moves to Los Angeles, only to discover that the teens there are just as deadly. John Heard, Kelly Rowan, Clifton Gonzalez Gonzalez, Tony Plana(n)

programme.title: 10,000 B.C.
programme.desc: When a band of mysterious horse-riding warlords raid the Yaghal camp and kidnaps the beautiful Evolet along with many others, young mammoth hunter D'Leh is forced to lead a small group of hunters south to save her. Driven by destiny, the unlikely band of warriors must also battle saber-toothed cats and terror birds(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Wall Street Banker Jack Campbell has it all: more cash than he can shake a stick at, oodles of power and, above all, his freedom. But on Christmas Eve he challenges an armed robber, then on Christmas Day he wakes up to the life he would have had if he'd stayed with his college girlfriend: two noisy kids, a dead-end job selling tyres, and a people carrier instead of his Ferrari. At first he's horrified(n)

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: Wade Wilson, a former mercenary, is tricked into volunteering as the subject of a bizarre experiment that gives him superhuman abilities. He becomes an antihero with a warped sense of humour and goes on a mission to hunt down the people who are responsible for his twisted condition(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Young widow Holly Kennedy discovers that her late husband has left her ten monthly messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life. Adapted from Cecelia Ahern's best-selling novel. Starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler, Kathy Bates and Lisa Kudrow(n)

programme.title: The Forest
programme.desc: In this haunting thriller, a young woman searches for her twin sister in an infamous Japanese forest beneath Mount Fuji where lost souls go to commit suicide. With the help of an American guide, she treks into the heart of the mysterious woodland(n)

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: An elite group of FBI agents clash with local authorities in Saudi Arabia while investigating a terrorist bombing of a Western housing compound. Jamie Foxx, Chris Cooper and Jennifer Garner star in this action-packed political thriller. Jason Bateman, Ashraf Barhom, Ali Suliman, Jeremy Piven. Directed by Peter Berg(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: A betrayed mob hit man goes the lam with his son, and seeks revenge against vicious gangsters. As the bullets start to fly, the impressionable child is exposed to the goriest aspects of his father's talents in this gorgeously stylized action thriller(n)
