Later, Hank takes a meeting with an off-the-wall Oscar-winning actor who's set to play him in the film of the novel. At the Runkle house, Marcy is literally becoming sick of Hank, and Hank's effort to pen an apology to Becca takes a bad turn(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: Home Sweet Home. Hank is surprised and pleased when Karen invites him to stay with her upon his release from the hospital after his accidental overdose; Becca is invited to join a band composed of four teenage punks. Meanwhile, anxious over the delay in getting the film going, the producer confronts Charlie at the Runkle Residence and leaves smitten with Marcy(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: Monkey Business. Hank gets seriously bad news when his attorney (Carla Gugino) notifies him that the statutory-rape case is going to trial, but first he and Charlie take the completed film script to the director, producer and financier and the meeting takes a most unusual turn. Meanwhile, Karen and Marcy buy a home-pregnancy test to see if the latter is with child, while the former takes an interest in Becca's bandmate's father, an artist(n)

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a club owner in a fight, ex-Navy seal Bobby Kalinowsky must fight for his life when the dead man's gangster brother puts a price on his head. Action(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a mountain cabin along with six other distrustful travellers(n)

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: A stunning look at the pardon of former death-row inmate Anthony Porter, and subsequent arrest of another man, for a double murder committed in Chicago in the '80s. The filmmakers question whether Porter was in fact guilty of the crime(n)

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Comedian Pete Correale delivers a stand-up routine(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed loner Dr. Cas Pepper finds himself on the run with an aspiring young writer who hopes to help Cas overcome the writer's block preventing him from writing a proper suicide note; along the way, the unlikely pair discover life has more to teach them both(n)

programme.title: Love the Coopers
programme.desc: In this heartwarming comedy, four generations of the Cooper family gather to spend Christmas Eve together. When unexpected events disrupt the evening, they must reaffirm their bonds and embrace the spirit of the season(n)

programme.title: Knock Knock, It's Tig Notaro
programme.desc: Comedian Tig Notaro travels across the U.S. and puts on a series of stand-up performances in the homes, backyards, barns and basements of her most loyal fans, with each intimate show offering the potential for epiphany or disaster(n)

programme.title: L Word Mississippi: Hate the Sin
programme.desc: Examining the unique challenges and struggles facing a group of lesbians who live in the conservative Deep South(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: A triumphant sports bio of Depression-era heavyweight champ Jim Braddock and his devoted wife(n)

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: In this film, teenager Timothy Hutton lives under a cloud of guilt after his brother drowns while trying to rescue the suicide-prone Hutton. Despite intensive therapy sessions, Hutton can't shake the belief that he should have died instead of his brother; nor do his preoccupied parents offer much solace(n)

programme.title: Love the Coopers
programme.desc: In this heartwarming comedy, four generations of the Cooper family gather to spend Christmas Eve together. When unexpected events disrupt the evening, they must reaffirm their bonds and embrace the spirit of the season(n)

programme.title: Van Wilder 2: The Rise of Taj
programme.desc: The protégé of the most skilled mischief maker in college history sets his sights on England's prestigious Camden University to offer an informative course in advanced-level shenanigans in this sequel to the 2002 Ryan Reynolds hit that finds that film's co-star Kal Penn crossing the pond to realize his true party potential. Van Wilder's former assistant has learned the ways of the master, and now he's prepared to share his newfound knowledge with the stuffy students of the school known more for academia than rowdy mischief. Of course, by now Taj (Penn) knows that where there's a will there's a way, and there are plenty of fun-loving misfits at this esteemed institute of higher learning who are just looking for an excuse to ditch their studies and blow off a little steam by embracing their inner Van Wilder(n)

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A shallow sex-addict makes the decision to change his ways and forge a deeper connection with the opposite sex(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part Two
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner(n)

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Chris Kentis wrote and directed this minimalist thriller, which will have you on the edge of your seat. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star as yuppies who are accidentally left at sea during a scuba-diving excursion. Then, the killer sharks show up(n)

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: Over the course of the Christmas holidays a terrifying stranger's prank calls to a sorority house escalate into a deadly killing spree(n)

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: When a man moves to America to pursue his dream, he becomes involved in a conspiracy to start the next world war(n)

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Children have a very good reason to be afraid of the dark in this flashy horror story. Matilda Dixon was a genially eccentric woman who, in the 1850s, lived in a New England town known as Darkness Falls. Matilda was well known to the local children for her habit of paying them for teeth they'd lost, but when two youngsters mysteriously disappeared, Matilda was lynched by an angry mob wrongly convinced that she had murdered the kids. In the year 2002, former Darkness Falls resident Kyle Walsh (Chaney Kley) lives in Las Vegas and is still desperately afraid of the dark since a childhood run-in with the ghost of Matilda Dixon left him severely traumatized. While police and psychiatrists scoffed at Kyle's stories about Matilda's spirit, his childhood friend Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) is alarmed when her nine-year-old brother Michael (Lee Cormie) begins having nightmares very much like those which disturbed Kyle's rest for years. Like Kyle, Michael has little luck convincing most grown-ups that the white-robed specters he sees in the dark are real, so Caitlin asks Kyle to return to Darkness Falls to help get to the bottom of his story. Darkness Falls marked the directorial debut of filmmaker Jonathan Liebesman(n)

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A petty thief and his cohort, a recently orphaned teen boy, embark on a road trip adventure that involves multiple robberies and results in a strong connection between the two(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: The plans of five college friends headed for a fun-filled weekend get abruptly changed when they find a 7-year-old girl alone at an empty café and have no choice but to drive her home. Once there, the group's worst nightmares are realized(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: In this kinky comedy-drama, business colleagues Les and Natalie are stuck in Albuquerque during a long layover. While Natalie considers cheating on her partner, Les decides to investigate a drunken affair he had the last time he was in the city(n)

programme.title: The Seven Five
programme.desc: Profiling a corrupt New York police officer who profited from the drug trade(n)

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: An Arab sheikh makes American rider Frank an unmissable offer: win a 3,000 mile desert race on his mustang and take home $100,000(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as troubled boxer Billy Hope in this high-stakes drama from director Antoine Fuqua and Sons of Anarachy creator Kurt Sutter. At the height of his fame and success, Hope is convinced by his loving wife Maureen (Rachel McAdams) to retire from the sport in order to spend more time with the couple's daughter Leila (Oona Laurence). On the night of his retirement announcement, a rival boxer calls out Hope and an altercation breaks out, killing Maureen. Hope's self-destructive behavior worsens, and Leila is taken away by child services. In order to redeem his life and get his daughter back, Hope must return to boxing under the tutelage of hardened trainer Titus "Tick" Willis (Forest Whitaker)(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: Jazzman Chet Baker must relearn his craft in the late '60s after his front teeth are knocked out during a mugging. As he strives to get his career back on track and overcome his heroin addiction, he receives support from his new girlfriend, an actress who was cast to play his lover in a movie about his life(n)

programme.title: Requiem for a Dream
programme.desc: Darren Aronofsky's stark drama is a harsh examination of how drugs (and not just the illegal one) wreck lives and dreams. Ellen Burstyn (The Yards, Cross The Line) is a blowsy overweight housewife, Jared Leto (The Panic Room) her son, Jennifer Connelly (Oscar winner in A Beautiful Mind) his girlfriend. Burstyn's dream is to appear on a TV quiz show, svelte and in a red dress, and she starts wolfing down diet pills while Leto is after the one big score that will set him up, ignoring his suppurating arm while Connelly, under his spell, begins to sell herself. Stunningly shot, the film, based on Hubert Selby Jr's novel, is driven by the three leads' outstanding performances(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford hosts this installment from Las Vegas, featuring Earthquake, Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb and Donnell Rawlings(n)

programme.title: Paid in Full
programme.desc: Paid in Full marks the feature debut of director Charles Stone III, who rose to fame after creating Budweiser's "Wassup" commercials. The urban gangster drama is loosely based on the true story of 1980s Harlem drug kingpins AZ, Rich Porter, and Alpo. (This story was also the basis for a documentary, Game Over (Part 1).) Ace (Wood Harris) works at a laundromat, struggling to get by, while his friend Mitch (Mekhi Phifer) lives the high life selling heroin. His sister's boyfriend, Calvin (Kevin Carroll) also sells drugs, and looks down on Ace for struggling to earn a living. Out delivering laundry one day, Ace meets Lulu (Esai Morales), a big time coke dealer, who lives better than anyone Ace has ever known. When Lulu leaves some coke in the pocket of a coat he's having cleaned, Ace returns it to him, and Lulu rewards him for his honesty by letting him keep the drugs. When Calvin gets busted, Ace hesitantly takes his place in the neighborhood, and starts working for Lulu. As the crack business takes off, Ace finds himself making more money than he knows what to do with. Mitch goes to jail for a short time, where another inmate, Rico (rapper Cam'ron in his acting debut), defends him in a fight. By the time Mitch gets out of prison, Ace is running the neighborhood. Ace makes Mitch his right-hand man, and when Rico gets out of jail, he joins the crew. The drugs and money flow, and Ace tries to keep everyone happy, but there are some who want what's his, and will stop at nothing to get it. Paid in Full was shown at the 2002 Urbanworld Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
programme.desc: This dark drama is the prequel to the TV series, Twin Peaks, also by director David Lynch. A woman who seems to be innocent and pure by day leads a double life in a rural community where quite a bit of evil lurks just beneath the surface of an otherwise typical American small town. As she was sexually abused throughout her childhood by her possessed father, Laura has some obvious sexual problems and is heavily addicted to cocaine. This film tells of the bizarre and twisted circumstances that led to her murder--which was where the television series began(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: Larry the Cable Guy, the king of blue-collar comedy, stars in his feature-film debut about the outrageously funny misadventures of a Florida public health inspector. Iris Bahr, Bruce Bruce, Joanna Cassidy. Directed by Trent Cooper(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: In Hawaii, a former pro surfer (Kate Bosworth) who's trying to get back into competition falls for an NFL quarterback. Good action sequences, but film sinks with the romantic subplot.Co-writer and director John Stockwell is an avid surfer, as is producer Brian Grazer(n)

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: Bloodthirsty terror from David Cronenberg. A young woman undergoes experimental life-saving surgery after a motorcycle crash and develops an insatiable hunger for human flesh as a result(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is an American teenager obsessed with Hong Kong cinema and kung-fu classics. One day, he makes an extraordinary discovery in a Chinatown pawnshop -- he finds the legendary fighting stick of Chinese sage and warrior The Monkey King. With the stick in his hands, he is suddenly transported back to ancient China, where he joins an army of fierce warriors. Together, they'll embark in a dangerous quest to free the imprisoned king. Martial arts stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li come together onscreen for the first time ever(n)

As the writer uncovers facts that corroborate these suspicions, he begins to fear he might be killed, just like the man who worked on the memoirs before him. Directed by Roman Polanski. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams(n)

programme.desc: CIA man Brad Pitt faces death in a Chinese jail; veteran agent Robert Redford is his only shot at freedom(n)

programme.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: This biopic chronicles the incredible journey of Brazilian soccer star Pelé (played as a young boy by Leonardo Lima Carvalho, and as a teen by Kevin de Paula). Birth of a Legend focuses on his youth in the slums of São Paulo and his rapid ascension to the national team, where, at the age of just 17, he helped lead the squad to their first ever World Cup victory in 1958. Vincent D'Onofrio co-stars. Directed by Jeff and Michael Zimbalist(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: In this biblical suspense drama, Roman soldier Clavius (Joseph Fiennes) and his partner Lucius (Tom Felton) are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during the course of their investigation. Directed by Kevin Reynolds(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Gathering. Claire plots to escape during the Castle's Gathering ceremony, but encounters with Jamie and a drunken Dougal alter her plans(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Nick Hornby novel about the friendship that develops between a bright but awkward 12-year-old boy and a wayward thirtysomething man masquerading as a lone parent in a bid to seduce single mothers. The boy initiates the bachelor into the world of adult responsibility and meaningful relationships as the bond between them deepens(n)

programme.title: Miracles From Heaven
programme.desc: Religious drama based on a true story about a young girl who is miraculously cured of a digestive disorder following a serious accident(n)

programme.title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
programme.desc: The third instalment of the popular holiday series picks up with Everyman-turned-Santa-Claus Scott Calvin just days before Christmas. Not only is toy production behind schedule, but another special delivery is on its way--Scott's wife, Carol/Mrs. Claus is pregnant. To add to the pressure, Carol's parents are coming for a visit, prompting an emergency make-over for Santa's Village to protect Scott's true identity..(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee, now living in New York, wages war against a drugs runner when his reporter girlfriend is kidnapped because she has incriminating film of a drugs-related murder. Having rescued her with his Antipodean cunning and the help of a gang of punks, the couple flee to the relative safety of the Australian Outback, but the Uzi-totin' baddies are in hot pursuit(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVII. Silver and his men track Flint on Skeleton Island; Madi receives an offer; Rogers struggles to hear Eleanor; Billy casts his lot(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: 1991. Secrets from the past are uncovered as Julien finally learns the truth behind Alice and Sophie's abduction. But time is running out, and nobody in Eckhausen will listen to him. Has Julien cracked the case, or is he simply deluded? With nowhere left to turn, how far will Julien go in his search to find the truth?(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three best friends reunite every Christmas Eve for a wild night of debauchery in New York City. Since they're getting older and have new responsibilities, they plan one last epic bash together and try to find their way into the biggest party in the city, the Nutcracka Ball(n)

programme.title: Private Parts
programme.desc: America's most controversial radio personality, 'shock-jock' Howard Stern, stars in this hysterical, semi- autobiographical movie. The film follows Howard's rise and rise, from his troubled childhood years to his college days and then onto his escalating celebrity as a national hero with a radio show that attracts more than 18 million listeners daily. Most of Stern's more infamous radio outbursts are included in the movie and there are cameo roles for the people who helped and hindered him along the way to becoming a legend. You may not have heard of him now, but by the end of the movie you'll be craving more of the phenomenon that is Howard Stern(n)

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Irish playwright Martin McDonagh brings crackling dialogue and pitch-black humour to this tale about hit men laying low after a botched job. Exiled to picturesque Bruges, Belgium, partners Ken and Ray kill time in pubs, museums and medieval churches while awaiting word from their sociopathic boss. The fun is over when he calls with a troubling new assignment(n)

programme.desc: This peppy and uproarious teen romp is boosted by excellent performances from Nicholas D'Agosto and Eric Christian Olsen as Illinois high-school football stars who bag summer camp in red-hot Texas to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead. But before they know it, both get more involved, romantically and athletically, than they expected. Molly Sims. Directed by Will Gluck(n)

programme.title: Misconduct
programme.desc: A lawyer attempts to bring an unethical pharmaceutical executive to justice for manipulating drug trials, but his case is soon undermined when he is targeted by a blackmail scheme involving an extramarital affair(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: (2005) Ridley Scott's epic historical drama is set in the 12th century at the Crusader defence of Jerusalem. Orlando Bloom plays Balian de Ibelin, a village blacksmith and the illegitimate son of Godfrey de Ibelin (Liam Neeson), a crusader knight returned from the Holy Land. He persuades Balian that riches await those who go to defend the city and its Christian King Baldwin (Edward Norton) against the attack of Saladin (Ghassan Massoud), who seeks to win the city back for the Muslim faith. Balian, as well as falling for Baldwin's sister Sibylla (Eva Green), finds himself a power broker between the two factions, with the fate of the city in his hands. In English, and Arabic, Latin and Italian with English subtitles. M,W,R,S,,HD(n)

programme.title: Cry Wolf
programme.desc: The school of hard knocks would be a piece of cake compared to this intricately plotted horror flick about a clique of snooty prep-school pranksters who start to panic after concocting a game of murder that turns into the real thing. Julian Morris, Lindy Booth, Jon Bon Jovi, Jared Padalecki, Sandra McCoy, Kristy Wu, Gary Cole, Jesse Janzen, Paul James, Anna Deavere Smith(n)

programme.title: White Noise
programme.desc: Michael Keaton stars as an architect who is shattered by the death of his beloved wife, and is then contacted by a man (Ian McNeice) who claims he is receiving messages from his dead wife through Electronic Voice Phenomena, The grieving widower ultimately is convinced of the communication's validity, and soon becomes fixated on trying to contact his wife himself -- but his investigation into EVP inadvertently unlocks a door to another terrifying world(n)

programme.title: Truth

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Artifact hunter and archaeologist extraordinaire Ben Franklin Gates learns of his own family's implication in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln by John Wilkes Booth. Gates must then locate an elusive diary, not only to clear his family's name, but to unearth and connect several secrets, buried within the book, that point to a massive, global conspiracy(n)

programme.desc: Tired of being bullied at school and neglected at home, Jess Aarons and Leslie Burke escape into the woods, where Leslie opens Jess's mind to the amazing kingdom of Terabithia. It's a secret land where they reign supreme among the giants, ogres and other fantastical creatures they create(n)

programme.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
programme.desc: The third entry in the series is another song-and-dance extravaganza that sees the gang being faced with important life decisions involving college, relationships and the future(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Fact-based sports tale stars Dennis Quaid as Jim Morris, a high-school teacher and coach who makes it to the Major Leagues as a 35-year-old relief pitcher(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Artifact hunter and archaeologist extraordinaire Ben Franklin Gates learns of his own family's implication in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln by John Wilkes Booth. Gates must then locate an elusive diary, not only to clear his family's name, but to unearth and connect several secrets, buried within the book, that point to a massive, global conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Moving, gritty drama about the genuine love shared by a couple who have hit rock bottom. An alcoholic, fired from his Hollywood job, moves to Vegas with the intention of drinking himself to death. He meets a prostitute on the run from her pimp, they fall in love and he moves in. They make a pact that she will not ask him to stop drinking and he will not question her lifestyle. Nicolas Cage won an Oscar for Best Actor for his performance(n)

programme.title: 8MM
programme.desc: Tom Welles (Nicolas Cage) is a surveillance expert on the rise. He's living the American dream with a wife, Amy (Catherine Keener), infant daughter, and a house in the suburbs of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. After the completion of an assignment for a U.S. Senator, Welles is summoned to the house of a recently deceased captain of industry. His widow, in settling his estate, has discovered an 8MM film in her late husband's private safe. The silent short depicts the apparent murder of a young woman by a large, masked figure, what is known as a "snuff" film. Greatly disturbed by the film's contents, the widow hires Welles to find the identity of the woman and determine if she is still alive. Welles finds the girl's identity and follows her trail from the time she ran away from home to Hollywood. Once there, Welles meets adult bookstore clerk Max California (Joaquin Phoenix) to act as Virgil to Welles' Dante. As the two begin their descent into the world of underground pornography, the detective grows more and more distant from his family, as if he cannot shake the taint of the world in which he now walks. Tom and Max eventually meet pornographers Dino Velvet (Peter Stormare) and Eddie Poole (James Gandolfini). By this time the detective finds he can no longer walk out of the inferno(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Two recent college graduates try to hack it in the real world. As the couple grapple with the pangs of adulthood, he learns that his writing internship will no longer lead to a full-time gig, while she is laid off from her first post-grad position(n)

programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: A misfit dodgeball team led by an amiable underachiever competes against a squad sponsored by a corporate giant in an effort to save their rundown gym from foreclosure(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: An interracial couple moves into their California dream home, only to find themselves the target of their volatile next-door neighbor -- a racist LAPD officer -- in this tightly wound thriller starring Samuel L. Jackson and Kerry Washington. Newlyweds Chris and Lisa seem like they have the perfect marriage and now, with their new home in the exclusive community Lakeview Terrace, the perfect life as well, but things soon turn ugly in the posh neighborhood when they begin to receive threats from their neighbor Abel, a middle-aged LAPD officer who has obvious objections to the couple's interracial marriage. What starts as an attitude problem soon morphs into full-on harassment, and before long the couple finds that their worries go far beyond their property values -- or the encroaching California wildfire burning in view of their community -- as they begin to fear for their lives(n)

programme.title: Like Water for Chocolate
programme.desc: A classic of romantic and foodie cinema. The twin themes of sexuality and food provide potent ingredients for comedy and tenderness. Set during the Mexican revolution the film begins and ends in the kitchen. Tita, is forced to prepare the wedding banquet for the man she loves but cannot have and she transfers all her emotions and feelings into the food, these emotions being passed on to anyone who tastes her cooking(n)

programme.desc: A young man lingers in the family home of his fiancee, after her accidental death. While grieving along with her parents and getting drawn into legal issues presented by a district attorney seeking justice for the family, he finds himself falling in love with another woman, against his own best intentions(n)

While his father Malachy wastes their meagre budget on alcohol and his mother Angela struggles to cope, Frank and his siblings face a life and death fight for survival(n)

He is pursued by corporate agents who are also after the number, which is tied to the stock market. Mark Margolis, Ben Shenkman. Written and directed by Darren Aronofsky(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: In a throwback to 1970s exploitation films and drive-in double features, directors Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez serve up a chilling two-fer with "Death Proof" and "Planet Terror." The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: The sensational first act of Tarantino's ultraviolent revenge thriller sees Uma Thurman cut loose on the scum who turned her wedding into a bloodbath(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: Lethal bride Uma Thurman is back to hunt down the last of her targets in the conclusion to Quentin Tarantino's bloody revenge epic(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A band of criminals are assembled for a jewel heist by a kingpin who keeps them anonymous from each other. But when the job goes wrong, the group is left bloodied and panicked, wondering who among them is the rat(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: Vincent Gallo wrote, directed and stars as Billy Brown, a released con who kidnaps blonde micro-skirted Layla from her dance class and persuades her pretend to be his wife for the benefit of his dysfunctional parents. Meanwhile he plots revenge against the player for the American football team Buffalo Bills whose mis-kick landed him in prison. Absolutely bizarre, individual yet totally absorbing, with a stellar cast who move from high comedy to dark drama, this is a unique one-man film that bears comparison to Sling Blade for its audacity(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: This sequel to the smash-hit comic-book epic The Avengers finds the iconic superhero team dealing with a threat of their own making: a sentient robot called Ultron (voice of James Spader), who was originally designed as part of a peacekeeping program. Since the events of the last film, Captain America (Chris Evans), Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner), and Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) have been working to take down various cells of a secret society of villains known as HYDRA. Their zeal to make the world a better, safer place inspires Tony Stark, genius billionaire and alter ego of Iron Man, to create Ultron in order to respond to additional threats that the Avengers aren't able to handle. Ultron, unfortunately, takes this directive way too seriously -- he believes that world peace can only be achieved by exterminating humanity, and he'll stop at nothing to accomplish this goal. The battle between the Avengers and Ultron is further complicated by the appearance of superpowered siblings Quicksilver (Aaron Taylor-Johnson) and Scarlet Witch (Elizabeth Olsen), who ally themselves with the homicidal android. Samuel L. Jackson and Cobie Smulders co-star as, respectively, S.H.I.E.L.D. operatives Nick Fury and Maria Hill. Joss Whedon, writer and director of the previous Avengers movie, returns in both capacities here(n)

programme.desc: The assassination of a spy boss triggers internecine warfare among rival teams of clandestine government agents in a secret underground complex(n)

The film makers put together a concert of the great survivors, reuniting many of the stars under the STAX record label. programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: This sequel to the smash-hit comic-book epic The Avengers finds the iconic superhero team dealing with a threat of their own making: a sentient robot called Ultron (voice of James Spader), who was originally designed as part of a peacekeeping program. Since the events of the last film, Captain America (Chris Evans), Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner), and Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) have been working to take down various cells of a secret society of villains known as HYDRA. Their zeal to make the world a better, safer place inspires Tony Stark, genius billionaire and alter ego of Iron Man, to create Ultron in order to respond to additional threats that the Avengers aren't able to handle. Ultron, unfortunately, takes this directive way too seriously -- he believes that world peace can only be achieved by exterminating humanity, and he'll stop at nothing to accomplish this goal. The battle between the Avengers and Ultron is further complicated by the appearance of superpowered siblings Quicksilver (Aaron Taylor-Johnson) and Scarlet Witch (Elizabeth Olsen), who ally themselves with the homicidal android. Samuel L. Jackson and Cobie Smulders co-star as, respectively, S.H.I.E.L.D. operatives Nick Fury and Maria Hill. Joss Whedon, writer and director of the previous Avengers movie, returns in both capacities here(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Newly fired sports agent Jerry Maguire carves out his own career, signing a star pro-football player and falling for new employee Dorothy Boyd. Comedy drama(n)

As Alex attempts to uncover the truth, she utilises her lethal skills to seek revenge for the murder of her friends(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: The up-and-down-and-up-again story of musician Dewey Cox, whose songs would change a nation. On his rock 'n roll spiral, Cox sleeps with 411 women, marries three times, has 22 kids and 14 step-kids, stars in his own 70s TV show, collects friends ranging from Elvis to the Beatles to a chimp, and gets addicted to - and then kicks - every drug known to man; but despite it all, Cox grows into a national icon and eventually earns the love of a good woman - longtime backup singer Darlene(n)

programme.title: Only the Strong Survive
programme.desc: Documentary film makers DA Pennebaker and Chris Hegedus and journalist Robert Friedman had a mission: to catch up with the great soul singers of the 1960s and 1970s. The film makers put together a concert of the great survivors, reuniting many of the stars under the STAX record label. Featured artists include William Bell, Jerry Butler, The Chi-Lites, Isaac Hayes, Sam Moore, Ann Peebles, Wilson Pickett, Rufus Thomas and Mary Wilson(n)

programme.desc: Director Steve James, the filmmaker behind the revered basketball documentary Hoop Dreams, returns to the topic of sports with Head Games, a look at how the study of concussions and brain injuries has had a profound effect on professional and amateur athletes. Among the experts interviewed are hockey player Keith Primeau, American Olympian Cindy Parlow Cone, and award-winning sports broadcaster Bob Costas. Based on the nonfiction book by Chris Nowinski(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Steins
programme.desc: The competition heats up as a young man on the cusp of adulthood in Brentwood, CA, prepares for his upcoming bar mitzvah, and his father strives to outdo the gargantuan coming-of-age bash recently thrown by his number-one nemesis, in a madcap tale of Hebrew rivalry from actor-turned-director Scott Marshall. Benjamin Fiedler (Daryl Sabara) is about to become a man, though the prospect of reciting a language he doesn't even really know in front of a temple full of strangers is so daunting that it makes him wish he could just stay a boy and write the whole thing off. As if his personal peccadilloes weren't enough to rack Benjamin's nerves, his father, Adam (Jeremy Piven), and mother, Joanne (Jami Gertz), are determined to send Benjamin into the adult world in true style. Recently, Adam's rival agent, Arnie Stein (Larry Miller), threw down the gauntlet for his own son's bar mitzvah by hosting a no-holds-barred bash that made New Year's Eve in Times Square look like cake-and-coffee day at the retirement community, and ultra-competitive Adam is determined to prove that he can top that now-legendary party. When Adam's aging, hippy-dippy father, Irwin (Garry Marshall), rolls into town in a broken-down RV with his dizzy young girlfriend, Sandy (Daryl Hannah), however, it appears as if all of his plans to out-class Arnie Stein may have been for naught(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Little People. Though it casts all known laws of physics to the four winds, this Rod Serling-scripted Twilight Zone episode scores points on an "important message" level. Arriving on a strange planet, Earth astronauts Peter Craig (Joe Maross) and William Fletcher (Claude Akins) stumble upon a microscopic city populated by teeny tiny people. While Fletcher seeks only to befriend the local citizens, the arrogant, power-hungry Craig is perfectly content to be worshipped as a god. Ordering Fletcher back into the spaceship, Craig stays behind, looking forward to a long and fruitful reign over the little people. . .a reign that comes to an abrupt end in a most ironic fashion. "The Little People" originally aired March 30, 1962(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Genius. The killing of a taxi driver leads to a case involving a lost book, two authors and the accused demanding the death penalty(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Maritime. A woman's body is fished out of the East River, and evidence at the crime scene points to a missing football player. Also intimately involved in the case is the athlete's brother, Sean Ridgeway (Craig Walker), and his parents Howard and Miriam (John Doman and Lizbeth Mackay). This episode is distinguished by two facts: It was broadcast on a Thursday night, rather than the usual Law & Order Wednesday slot, and it was the subject of a Newsday article, written by a journalist who'd been hired to appear as an extra(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Skate or Die. The murders of three homeless men are attributed to a serial killer, but detectives think a copycat killer may be involved after they find out a victim was wearing a pair of roller skates that did not belong to him(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The Drowned and the Saved. The classy cop drama reaches its 19th season finale. Lupo and Bernard investigate when a prominent charity executive is brutally murdered(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: The Man Under the Hood. Arrow battles Slade, which results in a member of Team Arrow going to the hospital. Meanwhile, Thea hits her breaking point; and Laurel struggles with a new secret(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Marry-Go-Round. Cole tries to sabotage his wedding day so he can marry Phoebe in another ceremony that would guarantee that his progeny would succeed him as The Source. Meanwhile, Paige sees a frightening future for Cole and Phoebe during a tarot-card reading. Lazarus Demon: Coolio. Cole: Julian McMahon. Phoebe: Alyssa Milano. Paige: Rose McGowan(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Fifth Halliwheel. Paige begins to feel left out because she is living with two married couples - newlyweds Phoebe and Cole plus already-married Leo and Piper. Her isolation is made worse by her conviction that Cole is following an evil path. Meanwhile, Cole tries to give Phoebe a potion that will make her fall pregnant with a son capable of possessing immense evil powers(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Saving Private Leo. Piper's life is threatened when two ghosts (Costas and Louis Mandylor) who fought with Leo during World War II come looking for revenge. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Cole consider looking for a place of their own. Leo: Brian Krause. Cole: Julian McMahon. Piper: Holly Marie Combs(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Devil's Trap. Dean and Sam track down Meg and find where the demons have been keeping their father, but a nasty surprise awaits them, and the Colt is quickly running out of bullets. Bobby: Jim Beaver(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: In My Time of Dying. A comatose Dean has an out-of-body experience in which he is stalked by a Reaper; and John considers making a grave sacrifice(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Bloodlust. Sam and Dean meet another hunter named Gordon, but Ellen warns the brothers that his zeal is dangerous. Later, Sam makes a surprising discovery about a group of vampires(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: Children Shouldn't Play With Dead Things
programme.desc: Children Shouldn't Play With Dead Things. A college student's death in a car crash is not enough to keep her in the grave, as Sam and Dean uncover a gruesome tale of broken hearts and black magic gone awry. Angela: Tamara Mason. Neil: Christopher Jacot. Matt: Jared Keeso(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Doll in the Derby. Angela goes undercover in the cut-throat world of roller derby skating and the team try to find out the truth about Booth's curious medical appointment(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Shot in the Dark. Brennan is shot while working late at the lab, but her condition is further complicated by logic-defying visions of her deceased mother. Meanwhile, the team's investigation of the incident reveals that the perpetrator may be linked to the Jeffersonian(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Friend in Need. The remains of a 15-year-old boy are the subject of an investigation that begins to paint an unflattering portrait of the teen, who is initially remembered as being smart though socially awkward, but is ultimately linked to illegal behaviour and allegations of rape. Meanwhile, Finn wonders if he should tell Cam that her daughter is in town for the weekend(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Fact in the Fiction. New intern Oliver Wells unnerves Brennan with his unusual observations and impressive logic, which make her consider scientific theories she would have previously ruled out. Meanwhile, Booth balks at Brennan's embrace of time travel as a possible explanation during a murder investigation(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Survivor in the Soap. The remains of an immigrant from Sierra Leone are discovered in a barrel at a disposal facility for hazardous waste. Meanwhile, Cam and Arastoo try to keep their relationship under wraps; and Brennan and Booth discuss their holiday plans(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Doom in the Gloom. An investigation of the death of a US marine reveals the deceased's obsession with the apocalypse and a link to a group of doomsday preppers. Meanwhile, Sweets finds an apartment he loves, but Brennan and Booth doubt that he'll move out of their house(n)

programme.desc: Bite Me. Elizabeth Gracen guest stars as the Vampire Queen, who hopes to supplant the demon-possessed Cole (Julian McMahon) as ruler of the Underworld. To do this, the queen must shift the balance of power by turning Paige (Rose McGowan) against her half sisters, Charmed Ones Piper (Holly Marie Combs) and Phoebe (Alyssa Milano). Meanwhile, Phoebe is beginning to exhibit the signs of morning sickness -- indicating that the plan to impregnate her with Cole's evil seed is right on schedule!(n)

programme.sub-title: We're Off to See the Wizard

programme.desc: No Exit. Jo goes against her mother's wishes and follows Sam and Dean on a hunt involving the disappearances of blonde women from a particular building, but things don't go as planned(n)

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy goes on an outrageous road trip with badly behaved grandmother Susan Sarandon. Fun comedy with Dan Aykroyd and Kathy Bates. (2014)(93 mins)(n)
